Public Member Functions
gaia::text::TextPaint Class Reference

TextPaint is an extension of Paint that leaves room for some extra data used during text measuring and drawing. More...

#include <TextPaint.h>

Detailed Description

TextPaint is an extension of Paint that leaves room for some extra data used during text measuring and drawing.
